journals.notes: Actually this isn't a bug. As far as I can see you did build a 64 bit version. Try 32 bit for online games as they currently don't support 64 bit.

subject: Client segfaults when starting game
description:
I'm using an amd64 debian sid for which I compiled etl from git.

The menu works ok and the downloading of maps & other pk3 before starting the game looks good.

I also tried the etlegacy.com server, but could not connect (is it even running ?)

But when I try to connect to a game, the client segfaults with these messages :

@
----- finished R_Init -----
Sys_LoadGameDll -> FS_CL_ExtractFromPakFile(/home/toto/.etlegacy, silent, ui.mp.x86_64.so)
Sys_LoadDll(/home/toto/.etlegacy/silent/ui.mp.x86_64.so)... failed: "Failed loading /home/toto/.etlegacy/silent/ui.mp.x86_64.so: /home/toto/.etlegacy/silent/ui.mp.x86_64.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory"
Sys_LoadDll(./silent/ui.mp.x86_64.so)... failed: "Failed loading ./silent/ui.mp.x86_64.so: ./silent/ui.mp.x86_64.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory"
Sys_LoadDll: failed to load the mod library. Trying to revert to the default one.
Sys_LoadDll(./legacy/ui.mp.x86_64.so)... succeeded
Sys_LoadDll(ui) found vmMain function at 0x7ff1cb9f44b0
152 UI cvars in use.
ERROR: ui/main.menu, line 81: unknown menu item keyword windowtitle
ERROR: ui/main.menu, line 81: unknown menu item keyword Main
ERROR: ui/profile.menu, line 36: unknown menu item keyword windowtitle

...

ERROR: ui/wm_ftquickmessageAlt.menu, line 123: unknown menu item keyword windowtitle
ERROR: ui/wm_ftquickmessageAlt.menu, line 123: unknown menu item keyword MESSAGE
ERROR: ui/wm_ftquickmessageAlt.menu, line 134: unknown menu item keyword windowtitle
ERROR: ui/wm_ftquickmessageAlt.menu, line 134: unknown menu item keyword MESSAGE
ERROR: ui/wm_ftquickmessageAlt.menu, line 147: unknown menu item keyword windowtitle
ERROR: ui/wm_ftquickmessageAlt.menu, line 147: unknown menu item keyword MESSAGE
ERROR: ui/wm_ftquickmessageAlt.menu, line 158: unknown menu item keyword windowtitle
ERROR: ui/wm_ftquickmessageAlt.menu, line 158: unknown menu item keyword MESSAGE
ERROR: ui/ingame_main.menu, line 42: unknown menu item keyword windowtitle
ERROR: ui/ingame_main.menu, line 42: unknown menu item keyword MAIN
ERROR: ui/ingame_vote.menu, line 36: unknown menu item keyword windowtitle
ERROR: ui/ingame_vote.menu, line 36: unknown menu item keyword VOTE
ERROR: ui/ingame_vote_disabled.menu, line 57: unknown menu item keyword windowtitle
ERROR: ui/ingame_vote_disabled.menu, line 57: unknown menu item keyword VOTE

UI_Alloc: Failure. UI out of memory!
